content:
The chunk adds a Vector3 entry field for configuring the radiate origin of an Emitter, allowing users to define the point from which particles will launch away in Radiate mode.

self.createVector3Entry(
            emitterPage, 'Emitter', 'Radiate Origin',
            'particles launch away from this point in Radiate mode',
            command = self.setEmitterRadiateOrigin)
